title: How Many Calories in Brown Sugar?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in brown sugar per tablespoon, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition facts, with tweaks and FAQs for better understanding.
h1: How Many Calories in Brown Sugar?
assumptions: Packed light brown sugar; 1 tablespoon ≈12 g; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (light/dark), packing density, and moisture content. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of brown sugar contains about 52 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a teaspoon of brown sugar?
Is brown sugar lower in calories than white sugar?
faqs.a: No, similar at ≈52 kcal per tablespoon; brown has more moisture and molasses.

faqs.q: How many carbs in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Nearly all calories from carbs: 13.5 g per tablespoon, with 13.4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have fiber or protein?
faqs.a: No fiber or protein; it's almost pure sucrose with trace molasses.
